title: DELL Did Me Dirty... RTX 3070 Dell XPS Pre-Built
description: Head to  to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code: DAWID  I bought a Dell XPS desktop pre-built PC with an RTX 3070 in it. For $1500, it seems like a great deal, but Dell did me dirty...  Looking for some Noob-friendly, Dawid-Approved T-shirts?
